amendment.description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part A of House Report 115-559 to clarify that the defendant is still liable if the defendant fails to make substantial progress to remove the barrier.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Speier amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) offered by Ms. Speier.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Speier amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
